articles.title: Australian Journalist Cheng Lei, Jailed In China Returns Home After 3 Years - NDTV
articles.description: The former anchor for Chinese state broadcaster CGTN was arrested in 2020, and was formally charged with "supplying state secrets overseas".
articles.content:
Her release follows the completion of the legal process in China, according to the Australian statement.
Journalist Cheng Lei returned home to Australia on Wednesday after being released from about … [+3497 chars]
